name: wlklnwwlkln2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wi(wcel(c1, co(c2, cwwlksn, c0)), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cwlks, c0), c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), c2)))))

comment: A walk of length ` N ` as word corresponds to the sequence of vertices in a walk of length ` N ` in a simple pseudograph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-Apr-2021.)
